sentences.sentence: People who toiled in dim, dank factories were too exhausted to enjoy their family life.
sentences.translation: 在阴暗潮湿的工厂里苦作的人们精疲力竭了，无法享受家庭生活。

sentences.sentence: The kitchen was dank and cheerless.
The basement in our house is dark and dank, so it is full of mold.
sentences.translation: 我们家的地下室又暗又潮湿，里面长满了霉。
